title: Echoes of Emberfang
description: Uncover the Emberfang’s legacy by answering the Echo of Elara’s riddle and choosing to inherit its fiery blessing.

objectives.description: Solve the Emberfang riddle with the Echo of Elara.
Inherit the Emberfang’s blessing from Glimmerling’s Echo.

title: Echoes of Mosshide
description: Uncover the Mosshide’s legacy by offering a relic to the Echo of Elara and inheriting its earthen blessing.

objectives.description: Offer a Mosshide Root to the Echo of Elara.
Inherit the Mosshide’s blessing from Glimmerling’s Echo.

title: Echoes of Cloudtail
description: Uncover the Cloudtail’s legacy by solving the Echo of Elara’s riddle and inheriting its windy blessing.

objectives.description: Solve the Cloudtail riddle with the Echo of Elara.
Inherit the Cloudtail’s blessing from Glimmerling’s Echo.
